text:
Sabienzia Technologies | Backend Engineer Golang | Berlin | ONSITE | http://sabienzia.com

Sabienzia is a Software as a Service provider who has pioneered the virtualization of call centers. It offers VOIP Services as well as web based real-time statistics and management.

We are going to develop a new Backend with Golang, Go kit, SQL and Containers.

Please apply to jobs@sabienzia.com
